categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Spirit of Corellia was a SoroSuub Personal Luxury Yacht 3000 in use by the Jedi from the Talus base during the Galactic Civil War.

She was donated to the Jedi by Abagga Creel, a wealthy businesswoman from Corellia. During the battle of Talus the yacht was used to evacuate Rebel and Jedi personnel from the Talus base. It was shot down by a TIE/LN starfighter and crash-landed in a remote region of Corellia. The survivors of the crash, led by Rachi Sitra, then were forced to battle Imperial forces led by Darth Vader.
